targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', pr.created_at) as time,
  COUNT(*) as "Pull Requests"
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Total PRs
panels.description: Total number of pull requests created by team members in the selected time period

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', pr.merged_at) as time,
  COUNT(*) as "Merged PRs"
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND pr.state = 'MERGED'
  AND pr.merged_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.merged_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Merged PRs
panels.description: Total number of pull requests successfully merged in the selected time period

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at))) as "Average Lead Time (seconds)"
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND pr.state = 'MERGED'
  AND pr.merged_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.merged_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp

panels.title: Avg Lead Time
panels.description: Average time from PR creation to merge. Key DORA metric - shorter is better. Green <1 day, Yellow 1-3 days, Orange 3-7 days, Red >7 days

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', pr.created_at) as time,
  SUM(pr.additions) as "Total Additions"
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Lines Added
panels.description: Total lines of code added across all PRs in the selected period

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', pr.created_at) as time,
  SUM(pr.deletions) as "Total Deletions"
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Lines Removed
panels.description: Total lines of code removed across all PRs in the selected period. High deletions often indicate healthy refactoring

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  COUNT(*)::float / NULLIF(DATE_PART('day', $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp), 0) as "PRs per Day"
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp

panels.title: PRs Created/Day
panels.description: Average number of pull requests created per day. Indicates team throughput and coding velocity

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  COUNT(*)::float / NULLIF(DATE_PART('day', $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp), 0) as "PRs per Day"
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND pr.state = 'MERGED'
  AND pr.merged_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.merged_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp

panels.title: PRs Merged/Day
panels.description: Average number of pull requests merged per day. Indicates delivery throughput

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  AVG(pr.additions + pr.deletions) as "Average PR Size (lines)"
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp

panels.title: Avg PR Size
panels.description: Average lines changed per PR (additions + deletions). Smaller PRs (<200 lines) are easier to review and less risky

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.review_requested_at - pr.created_at))) as "Coding Time"
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND pr.review_requested_at IS NOT NULL
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp

panels.title: Coding Time
panels.description: Average time from PR creation to review request. Represents active development time before seeking feedback

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (first_review.submitted_at - COALESCE(pr.review_requested_at, pr.created_at)))) as "Review Wait Time"
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT MIN(submitted_at) as submitted_at
  FROM pull_request_reviews
  WHERE pull_request_id = pr.id
) first_review ON true
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND first_review.submitted_at IS NOT NULL
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp

panels.title: Review Wait Time
panels.description: Average time waiting for first review after requesting. Long wait times indicate review bottlenecks

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  AVG(review_count) as "Avg Reviews"
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT author_login) as review_count
  FROM pull_request_reviews
  WHERE pull_request_id = pr.id
) reviews ON true
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp

panels.title: Reviews per PR
panels.description: Average number of distinct reviewers per PR. More reviewers = better knowledge sharing but potentially slower merge

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - first_review.submitted_at))) as "Review to Merge Time"
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT MIN(submitted_at) as submitted_at
  FROM pull_request_reviews
  WHERE pull_request_id = pr.id
) first_review ON true
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND pr.state = 'MERGED'
  AND first_review.submitted_at IS NOT NULL
  AND pr.merged_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.merged_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp

panels.title: Review to Merge
panels.description: Average time from first review to merge. Includes rework cycles and approval delays

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT member) as "Team Members"
FROM teams
WHERE team = '$team'
  AND member IN ($included_members)

panels.title: Team Size
panels.description: Number of team members included in this dashboard view

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ROUND((100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE state = 'MERGED') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0))::numeric, 1) as value
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp;

panels.title: Merge Rate
panels.description: Percentage of PRs that were merged (vs closed/abandoned)

targets.rawSql:
WITH merged_prs AS (
  SELECT pr.id
  FROM prs pr
  JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
  WHERE t.team = '$team'
    AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
    AND pr.state = 'MERGED'
    AND pr.merged_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
    AND pr.merged_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
),
reviewed_prs AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT mp.id
  FROM merged_prs mp
  JOIN pull_request_reviews r ON r.pull_request_id = mp.id
)
SELECT ROUND((100.0 * COUNT(rp.id) / NULLIF(COUNT(mp.id), 0))::numeric, 1) as value
FROM merged_prs mp
LEFT JOIN reviewed_prs rp ON mp.id = rp.id;

panels.title: Review Coverage
panels.description: Percentage of merged PRs that received at least one review

targets.rawSql:
WITH merged_prs AS (
  SELECT pr.id, pr.author
  FROM prs pr
  JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
  WHERE t.team = '$team'
    AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
    AND pr.state = 'MERGED'
    AND pr.merged_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
    AND pr.merged_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
),
self_merged AS (
  SELECT mp.id
  FROM merged_prs mp
  WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM pull_request_reviews r
    WHERE r.pull_request_id = mp.id
      AND r.author_login != mp.author
      AND r.state IN ('APPROVED', 'CHANGES_REQUESTED')
  )
)
SELECT ROUND((100.0 * COUNT(sm.id) / NULLIF(COUNT(mp.id), 0))::numeric, 1) as value
FROM merged_prs mp
LEFT JOIN self_merged sm ON mp.id = sm.id;

panels.title: Self-Merge Rate
panels.description: Percentage of merged PRs without external review (potential risk)

targets.rawSql:
WITH team_prs AS (
  SELECT pr.id
  FROM prs pr
  JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
  WHERE t.team = '$team'
    AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
    AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
    AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
),
prs_with_changes_requested AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT tp.id
  FROM team_prs tp
  JOIN pull_request_reviews r ON r.pull_request_id = tp.id
  WHERE r.state = 'CHANGES_REQUESTED'
)
SELECT ROUND((100.0 * COUNT(pcr.id) / NULLIF(COUNT(tp.id), 0))::numeric, 1) as value
FROM team_prs tp
LEFT JOIN prs_with_changes_requested pcr ON tp.id = pcr.id;

panels.title: Rework Rate
panels.description: Percentage of PRs that received 'Changes Requested' reviews

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*) as value
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND pr.state = 'OPEN'
  AND pr.created_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days';

panels.title: Stale PRs (>7 days)
panels.description: Open PRs older than 7 days that need attention

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ROUND((COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE state = 'MERGED')::float / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0))::numeric, 2) as value
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp;

panels.title: Flow Ratio
panels.description: Merged/Created ratio - below 1.0 means backlog is growing

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', pr.created_at) as time,
  COUNT(*) as "PRs Created"
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', pr.merged_at) as time,
  COUNT(*) as "PRs Merged"
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND pr.state = 'MERGED'
  AND pr.merged_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.merged_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  generate_series(
    DATE_TRUNC('day', $__timeFrom()::timestamp),
    DATE_TRUNC('day', $__timeTo()::timestamp),
    '1 day'::interval
  ) as time,
  (
    SELECT AVG(daily_count)::numeric(10,1)
    FROM (
      SELECT COUNT(*) as daily_count
      FROM prs pr
      JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
      WHERE t.team = '$team'
        AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
        AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
        AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
      GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('day', pr.created_at)
    ) daily_counts
  ) as "Average PRs Created"

SELECT
  generate_series(
    DATE_TRUNC('day', $__timeFrom()::timestamp),
    DATE_TRUNC('day', $__timeTo()::timestamp),
    '1 day'::interval
  ) as time,
  (
    SELECT AVG(daily_count)::numeric(10,1)
    FROM (
      SELECT COUNT(*) as daily_count
      FROM prs pr
      JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
      WHERE t.team = '$team'
        AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
        AND pr.state = 'MERGED'
        AND pr.merged_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
        AND pr.merged_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
      GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('day', pr.merged_at)
    ) daily_counts
  ) as "Average PRs Merged"

panels.title: PR Activity Over Time
panels.description: Daily PR creation and merge activity. Compare trends to identify delivery patterns and bottlenecks

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', pr.created_at) as time,
  pr.state as metric,
  COUNT(*) as value
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
GROUP BY time, metric
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  pr.title as "PR Title",
  pr.author as "Author",
  pr.repository_name as "Repository",
  pr.state as "State",
  pr.additions as "Additions",
  pr.deletions as "Deletions",
  (pr.additions + pr.deletions) as "Total Changes",
  CASE
    WHEN (pr.additions + pr.deletions) <= 100 THEN 'Small'
    WHEN (pr.additions + pr.deletions) <= 500 THEN 'Medium'
    ELSE 'Large'
  END as "PR Size",
  pr.created_at as "Created At",
  pr.merged_at as "Merged At",
  CASE
    WHEN pr.merged_at IS NOT NULL THEN
      CASE
        WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at)) < 60 THEN
          ROUND(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at))) || ' seconds'
        WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at)) < 3600 THEN
          FLOOR(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at)) / 60) || ' minutes ' ||
          ROUND(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at)) % 60) || ' seconds'
        WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at)) < 86400 THEN
          FLOOR(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at)) / 3600) || ' hours ' ||
          FLOOR((EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at)) % 3600) / 60) || ' minutes'
        ELSE
          FLOOR(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at)) / 86400) || ' days ' ||
          FLOOR((EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at)) % 86400) / 3600) || ' hours'
      END
    ELSE NULL
  END as "Lead Time"
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
ORDER BY pr.created_at DESC
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC, SUM(pr.additions + pr.deletions) DESC) as "#",
  t.member as "Author",
  COUNT(*) as "PRs",
  SUM(pr.additions) as "Total Additions",
  SUM(pr.deletions) as "Total Deletions",
  SUM(pr.additions + pr.deletions) as "Total Changes",
  ROUND(AVG(pr.additions + pr.deletions)::numeric) as "Avg Changes",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN (pr.additions + pr.deletions) <= 100 THEN 1 END) as "Small",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN (pr.additions + pr.deletions) > 100 AND (pr.additions + pr.deletions) <= 500 THEN 1 END) as "Medium",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN (pr.additions + pr.deletions) > 500 THEN 1 END) as "Large"
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
GROUP BY t.member
ORDER BY "PRs" DESC, "Total Changes" DESC

panels.title: Author Statistics
panels.description: Individual contributor metrics showing PR volume, code changes, and PR size distribution (Small <100, Medium 100-500, Large >500 lines)

targets.rawSql:
WITH repo_metrics AS (
  SELECT
    pr.repository_name as "Repository",
    COUNT(*) as "PRs",
    ROUND((AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at))) / 86400)::numeric, 1) as "Avg Lead Time (days)",
    ROUND(AVG(pr.additions + pr.deletions)::numeric) as "Avg PR Size",
    COUNT(CASE WHEN pr.state = 'MERGED' THEN 1 END) as "Merged PRs"
  FROM prs pr
  JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
  WHERE t.team = '$team'
    AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
    AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
    AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
    AND pr.state = 'MERGED'
  GROUP BY pr.repository_name
)
SELECT *
FROM repo_metrics
WHERE "Avg Lead Time (days)" > 3 OR "Avg PR Size" > 500
ORDER BY "Avg Lead Time (days)" DESC NULLS LAST, "Avg PR Size" DESC

panels.title: Repositories Needing Attention
panels.description: Repositories with lead time >3 days or average PR size >500 lines. These may need process improvements

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CASE 
    WHEN r.language IS NULL OR r.language = '' THEN 'Unknown'
    ELSE r.language
  END as "Language",
  COUNT(DISTINCT pr.repository_name) as "Repositories"
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
LEFT JOIN repositories r ON LOWER(pr.repository_name) = LOWER(r.slug) AND LOWER(pr.repository_owner) = LOWER(r.org)
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
GROUP BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN r.language IS NULL OR r.language = '' THEN 'Unknown'
    ELSE r.language
  END
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT pr.repository_name) > 0
ORDER BY "Repositories" DESC
LIMIT 10

panels.title: Languages by Repository
panels.description: Distribution of programming languages across active repositories touched by the team

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CASE 
    WHEN r.language IS NULL OR r.language = '' THEN 'Unknown'
    ELSE r.language
  END as "Language",
  COUNT(*) as "PRs"
FROM prs pr
JOIN teams t ON pr.author = t.member
LEFT JOIN repositories r ON LOWER(pr.repository_name) = LOWER(r.slug) AND LOWER(pr.repository_owner) = LOWER(r.org)
WHERE t.team = '$team'
  AND pr.author IN ($included_members)
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
GROUP BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN r.language IS NULL OR r.language = '' THEN 'Unknown'
    ELSE r.language
  END
HAVING COUNT(*) > 0
ORDER BY "PRs" DESC
LIMIT 10

panels.title: Languages by PR Volume
panels.description: Distribution of programming languages by number of PRs. Shows where most development effort is focused

targets.rawSql:
WITH team_member_reviews AS (
  SELECT 
    r.author_login as "Reviewer",
    COUNT(*) as "Reviews",
    COUNT(DISTINCT r.pull_request_id) as "PRs Reviewed",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE r.state = 'APPROVED') as "Approvals",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE r.state = 'CHANGES_REQUESTED') as "Changes Requested",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE r.state = 'COMMENTED') as "Comments Only",
    ROUND((100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE r.state = 'APPROVED') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0))::numeric, 1) as "Approval Rate",
    ROUND(AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (r.submitted_at - pr.created_at)))::numeric) as "Avg Response Time"
  FROM pull_request_reviews r
  JOIN prs pr ON r.pull_request_id = pr.id
  JOIN teams t ON r.author_login = t.member
  WHERE t.team = '$team'
    AND r.author_login IN ($included_members)
    AND r.submitted_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
    AND r.submitted_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
  GROUP BY r.author_login
)
SELECT * FROM team_member_reviews
ORDER BY "Reviews" DESC;

panels.title: Reviewer Workload (Selected Period)
panels.description: Shows who is doing reviews, their approval rate, and response time

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT team FROM teams ORDER BY team
list.label: Team
list.name: team
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT team FROM teams ORDER BY team

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT member FROM teams WHERE team = '$team' ORDER BY member
list.label: Include Members
list.name: included_members
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT member FROM teams WHERE team = '$team' ORDER BY member
